snippet.title: Professor Layton and the New World of Steam – Trailer (LEVEL5 VISION 2023 II Ver.)
snippet.description:
Professor Layton and the New World of Steam
Teaser site: https://www.layton.jp/jouki/en/
*The translations in this trailer are provisional and may be subject to change before release.
*The version shown in this video is under development and may differ from the final product in some aspects.

雷頓教授與蒸氣新世界
宣傳網站: https://www.layton.jp/jouki/en/
※宣傳網站僅支援日文、英文。
※此影片中的內容為暫譯，正式版可能會有所更動。
※影片展示的遊戲畫面為開發中版本，可能與正式版有所出入。

#ProfessorLayton
#LEVEL5
